nodes.text: Didj Star Wars: The Clone Wars

Didj Star Wars: The Clone Wars is one of two Star Wars video games for the Leapfrog Didj. The other is Didj Star Wars: Jedi Trials. The game revolves around Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi attempting to destroy the factory responsible for making the Ultra Droidekas.

The gameplay follows a basic system: 4 worlds, with 4 levels per world. Each world ends with a boss fight, and throughout each level, players solve math problems to unlock checkpoints. Players can run, jump, and use their lightsabers and the Force to advance.

Use your Jedi powers to destroy a sinister new threat to the Republic! The Republic has just received news of a secret factory that is developing a powerful new droid, the Ultra Droideka. If unleashed, an army of Ultra Droidekas could almost certainly deal a fatal blow to the Republic and the Jedi Order! Play as Jedi Knights Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi as they race against time to stop the Separatists' evil plans. Earn points as you play to customize the game with music and lines from the movie, and choose the math skills you need to know for school. Recommended age range is 6 to 9 years old (grades 1 to 3).
